text: Arianna Caruso (born 6 November 1999) is an Italian footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Italy women's national team. ==Career== Caruso has been capped for the Italy national team, appearing for the team during the UEFA Women's Euro 2021 qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Italian women's footballers Category:Italy women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Juventus F.C. (women) players
title: Arianna Caruso
